decisions.name: Assignment_Lock_Check
decisions.label: Assignment Lock, Status, and Queue check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Status = New or Assignment Lock <> True

rules.name: Status_New_or_Assignment_Lock_True
rules.label: Status <> New or Assignment Lock = True

decisions.name: Check_Case_In_Monitoring_or_Not
decisions.label: Check Case In Monitoring or Not

rules.name: Case_Entered_In_Monitoring
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Case Entered In Monitoring

rules.name: Case_out_of_monitoring
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 6) OR (5 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4)
rules.label: Case Out of Monitoring

rules.name: Creation_Cat_Node_1_Country_CA_US_varCountryQueue_Null
rules.label: Creation Cat = Hosted & Country <> CA/US & varCountryQueue <> Null

rules.name: Creation_Cat_Node_1_Country_CA_US_varCountryQueue_Null_2
rules.label: Creation Cat = Hosted & Country <> CA/US & varCountryQueue = Null

rules.label: EC Case with Open Work Order
